description: All-purpose flagging task based on data-selections and flagging modes/algorithms.

parameters.info: Name of MS file or calibration table
parameters.name: msname

parameters.info: Flagging mode
parameters.name: mode

parameters.info: Field names or field index numbers:'' ==> all, field='0~2,3C286'
parameters.name: field

parameters.info: Spectral-window/frequency/channel: '' ==> all, spw='0:17~19'
parameters.name: spw

parameters.info: Antenna/baselines: '' ==> all, antenna ='3,VA04'
parameters.name: antenna

parameters.info: Time range: '' ==> all,timerange='09:14:0~09:54:0'
parameters.name: timerange

parameters.info: Correlation: '' ==> all, correlation='XX,YY'
parameters.name: correlation

parameters.info: Scan numbers: '' ==> all
parameters.name: scan

parameters.info: Observation intent: '' ==> all, intent='CAL*POINT*'
parameters.name: intent

parameters.info: (Sub)array numbers: '' ==> all
parameters.name: array

parameters.info: UV range: '' ==> all; uvrange ='0~100klambda', default units=meters
parameters.name: uvrange

parameters.info: Observation ID: '' ==> all
parameters.name: observation

parameters.info: Multi-feed numbers: Not yet implemented
parameters.name: feed

parameters.info: Flag only the auto-correlations
parameters.name: autocorr

parameters.info: Input ASCII file, list of files or Python list of strings with flag commands
parameters.name: inpfile

parameters.info: Select by REASON types
parameters.name: reason

parameters.info: List of time buffers (sec) to pad timerange in flag commands
parameters.name: tbuff

parameters.info: Data column on which to operate (data,corrected,model,weight,etc.)
parameters.name: datacolumn

parameters.info: Range to use for clipping
parameters.name: clipminmax

parameters.info: Clip outside the range, or within it
parameters.name: clipoutside

parameters.info: Average over channels (scalar average)
parameters.name: channelavg

parameters.info: Clip zero-value data
parameters.name: clipzeros

parameters.info: Quack n seconds from scan beginning or end
parameters.name: quackinterval

parameters.info: Quack mode. 'beg' ==> first n seconds of scan.'endb' ==> last n seconds of scan. 'end' ==> all but first n seconds of scan. 'tail' ==> all but last n seconds of scan.
parameters.name: quackmode

parameters.info: Flag incrementally in time?
parameters.name: quackincrement

parameters.info: Amount of shadow allowed (in meters)
parameters.name: tolerance

parameters.info: File name or dictionary with additional antenna names, positions and diameters
parameters.name: addantenna

parameters.info: Lower limiting elevation (in degrees)
parameters.name: lowerlimit

parameters.info: Upper limiting elevation (in degrees)
parameters.name: upperlimit

parameters.info: Time-range to use for each chunk (in seconds or minutes)
parameters.name: ntime

parameters.info: Accumulate data across scans depending on the value of ntime.
parameters.name: combinescans

parameters.info: Flagging thresholds in units of deviation from the fit
parameters.name: timecutoff

parameters.info: Flagging thresholds in units of deviation from the fit
parameters.name: freqcutoff

parameters.info: Fitting function for the time direction (poly/line)
parameters.name: timefit

parameters.info: Fitting function for the frequency direction (poly/line)
parameters.name: freqfit

parameters.info: Number of pieces in the polynomial-fits (for 'freqfit' or 'timefit' ='poly')
parameters.name: maxnpieces

parameters.info: Dimensions along which to calculate fits (freq/time/freqtime/timefreq)
parameters.name: flagdimension

parameters.info: Calculate additional flags using sliding window statistics (none,sum,std,both)
parameters.name: usewindowstats

parameters.info: Half-width of sliding window to use with 'usewindowstats' (1,2,3).
parameters.name: halfwin

parameters.info: Extend flags along time, frequency and correlation.
parameters.name: extendflags

parameters.info: If any correlation is flagged, flag all correlations
parameters.name: extendpols

parameters.info: Flag all 'ntime' integrations if more than X% of the timerange is flagged (0-100)
parameters.name: growtime

parameters.info: Flag all selected channels if more than X% of the frequency range is flagged(0-100)
parameters.name: growfreq

parameters.info: Flag data based on surrounding flags
parameters.name: growaround

parameters.info: Flag one timestep before and after a flagged one (True/False)
parameters.name: flagneartime

parameters.info: Flag one channel before and after a flagged one (True/False)
parameters.name: flagnearfreq

parameters.info: minimum number of flags (relative)
parameters.name: minrel

parameters.info: maximum number of flags (relative)
parameters.name: maxrel

parameters.info: minimum number of flags (absolute)
parameters.name: minabs

parameters.info: maximum number of flags (absolute). Use a negative value to indicate infinity.
parameters.name: maxabs

parameters.info: Print summary of channels per spw
parameters.name: spwchan

parameters.info: Print summary of correlation per spw
parameters.name: spwcorr

parameters.info: Print summary counts per baseline
parameters.name: basecnt

parameters.info: Name of this summary report (key in summary dictionary)
parameters.name: name

parameters.info: Action to perform in MS and/or in inpfile (none/apply/calculate)
parameters.name: action

parameters.info: Display data and/or end-of-MS reports at runtime (data/report/both).
parameters.name: display

parameters.info: Back up the state of flags before the run
parameters.name: flagbackup

parameters.info: Save the current parameters to the FLAG_CMD table or to a file
parameters.name: savepars

parameters.info: Reason to save to output file or to FLAG_CMD table.
parameters.name: cmdreason

parameters.info: Name of output file to save current parameters. If empty, save to FLAG_CMD
parameters.name: outfile

parameters.info: Number of timesteps in the sliding time window [aips:fparm(1)]
parameters.name: winsize

parameters.info: Time-series noise estimate : [aips:noise]
parameters.name: timedev

parameters.info: Spectral noise estimate : [aips:scutoff]
parameters.name: freqdev

parameters.info: Threshold scaling for timedev : [aips:fparm(9)]
parameters.name: timedevscale

parameters.info: Threshold scaling for freqdev : [aips:fparm(10)]
parameters.name: freqdevscale

parameters.info: Flag whole spectrum if freqdev is greater than spectralmax
parameters.name: spectralmax

parameters.info: Flag whole spectrum if freqdev is less than spectralmin : [aips:fparm(5)]
parameters.name: spectralmin

parameters.info: Bin width for channel average in number of input channels
parameters.name: chanbin
